text: Hey <@U012LKRF0RJ> I am not seeing it render this way on my end using :chrome:  latest build (Version 85.0.4183.121 (Official Build) (64-bit)). Can you tell me which browser you are using?

Love the feature to restore properties deleted but we should be able to permanently remove these fields immediately. The issue i am having is I have to now wait 90 days to recreate the gender field  from a text to a select dropdown with the same field name. Anyone find a workaround for this?
Is anyone else having issues accessing the Advanced Menus tool? It flickers and doesn't load on a couple of portals.
Hey hey <@U2H3TT8F2>, I'm seeing this on :firefox: Firefox 81.0.1 (64-bit) build 20200930150533.
